g -1 of CO and 13.7 mol g -1 of CH4 were produced over irradiated TiO2 nanospheres. In addition to the products from CO2 reduction, 11.3 mol g -1 of H2 was also produced over pure TiO2.Both the amount of CO and CH4 produced over CPO-27-MgTiO2 is much higher than that over the pure TiO2.Moreover, the incorporation of CPO-27-Mg into TiO2 can totally inhibit the reduction of H2O to form H2, which is a competitive reaction of the CO2 reduction.
